## 

 `moye`  ``  `` / `` 

### 

1. : `ui-{type}``{type}`
2. : `skin-{skin}`  `skin-{skin}-{type}`  `{skin}` 

### 

 `Control`  `render`  `Control.prototype.render()` 

### 

```js
var Button = require('moye/Button');
var button = new Button({
  main: document.getElementById('button'),
  skin: ['jinrong', 'small']
});
button.render();
```

 `moye` button

1. `ui-button` 
2. `skin-jinrong`  `skin-jinrong-button` 
3. `skin-small`  `skin-small-button`

Post.title: / Plugin
/ life cycle
Post._content:
# moye 

`moye`

1. `NEW` 
2. `INITED` 
3. `RENDERED` 
4. `DISPOSED` 

`Control`

1. `Control.prototype.initialize`: `NEW` -> `INITED`
2. `Control.prototype.render`: `INITED` -> `RENDERED`
3. `Control.prototype.dispose`: `RENDERED` -> `DISPOSED`



1. `Control.prototype.init` `NEW`
2. `Control.prototype.initStructure``Control.prototype.initEvents` `INITED`
3. `Control.prototype.repaint` `RENDERED`
4. `Control.prototype.dispose` `RENDERED`
